meanings.definition: The act of organizing or arranging something in a particular way.
meanings.sent1: Her structuring of the event made everything run smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The structuring of the files on the computer was well thought out.
meanings.sent3: The structuring of the picnic made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: His structuring of the team was like building a strong foundation.
meanings.sent5: The structuring of the garden was so meticulous that every plant had its place.

meanings.definition: The way in which something is organized or arranged.
meanings.sent1: The structuring of the shelves in the store was neat and tidy.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the structuring of the essay helped improve his writing.
meanings.sent3: The structuring of the party made it feel like a grand celebration.
meanings.sent4: The structuring of the city's layout was like a well-designed puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The structuring of the schedule ensured that everything was done on time.
